meanings.sent1: Her inconsiderableness towards others often led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was disappointed by the inconsiderableness of the students' behavior.
meanings.sent3: Despite his inconsiderableness, he always managed to make people laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The inconsiderableness of his actions spoke volumes about his character.
meanings.sent5: The inconsiderableness of the decision left everyone puzzled.

meanings.definition: Not worthy of consideration or attention.
meanings.sent1: The inconsiderableness gift was quickly forgotten by the recipient.
meanings.sent2: She dismissed his inconsiderableness remarks without a second thought.
meanings.sent3: The inconsiderableness painting in the corner added a quirky touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: His inconsiderableness behavior made him stand out in a negative way.
meanings.sent5: The inconsiderableness excuse did not justify his absence.
